verses.name: Psalms 124:1
verses.text: If it had not been the Lord who was on our side, now may Israel say;

verses.name: Psalms 124:2
verses.text: If it had not been the Lord who was on our side, when men rose up against us:

verses.name: Psalms 124:3
verses.text: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:

verses.name: Psalms 124:4
verses.text: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:

verses.name: Psalms 124:5
verses.text: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

verses.name: Psalms 124:6
verses.text: Blessed be the Lord, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.

verses.name: Psalms 124:7
verses.text: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

verses.name: Psalms 124:8
verses.text: Our help is in the name of the Lord, who made heaven and earth.
